item.title: How to Resize the Microsoft Windows Clock (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Resize the Microsoft Windows Clock: With Mouse With Hover With Right Click No time to scroll down? Click through this tutorial presentation: Watch a video tutorial: How to Resize the Microsoft Windows Clock With Mouse Step 1: First open Windows Clock. Hover the mouse over any edge or corner of the window, until the cursor becomes a double sided arrow. Step 2: Click, hold, and drag the mouse to resize the window.
